page.title: 02A TOUR OF OUR AREA
page.content: We travel along the steadily rising road out of Portadown to the Garvaghy roundabout (the "entrance" to our survey area) and the surroundings seem to change suddenly from city to countryside. It is almost like going into a different world,though from the hills of this{drumlin}area we have many fine views of Portadown lying below. We are in lush green{"Basket of {eggs"}countryside given almost completely to{farming}.There are many large farmhouses with their outbuildings as well as cottage-type dwellings. In more recent years many townspeople are choosing to build attractive modern bungalows in this quiet region. There are two main roads,one to Moy and the other to the Motorway and the North and West of the Province.
